name: Loneliness or isolation
description: For a friendly chat or advice on everyday living.

name: Anxiety or mental health
description: For any mental health issues you or your loved ones are facing.

name: Safe and healthy body
description: For medical conditions, addictions or safety concerns.

name: Exercise and wellbeing
description: For getting fit and healthy through exercise that works for you.

name: Arts and creativity
description: For classes and education that improve emotional wellbeing.

name: Food or shopping
description: For foodbanks, hot food or grocery provision.

name: Faith-led activities
description: For activites and groups focussing on religion or spirituality.

name: Money advice
description: For information and guiance on debt, benefits and finances.

name: Employment advice
description: For help with finding a job, careers and employment rights.

name: Housing advice
description: For advice on tenancy rights, accommodation and homelessness.

name: Immigration advice
description: For help and advice on immigration, asylum and refugee status.
